import React from 'react'; import Card from '@components/Card'; import Car from '@components/Car'; import Layout from '@components/ui/Layout'; import FilterIcon from '@assets/svg/filter.svg'; import Arrow from '@assets/svg/arrow.svg'; const exhibition = [ { img: '/images/image/image1', title: 'نمایشگاه ایران', name: 'علی محمدی', city: 'زنجان', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image2', title: 'نمایشگاه کاووس', name: ' سید احمدی', city: 'مازندران', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image3', title: 'نمایشگاه تندر ', name: 'دکتر میرکمالی', city: 'مازندران', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image4', title: 'اتو گالری ربی', name: 'رضای', city: 'اردبیل', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image5', title: 'اتو گالری محمدی', name: 'عسگری', city: 'تهران', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image6', title: 'اتو گالری احمدی', name: 'دایی', city: 'کرج', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image7', title: 'نمایشگاه حسینی', name: 'رجبی', city: 'ماهدشت', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image8', title: 'نمایشگاه محسن', name: 'عبدی', city: 'ورامین', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, { img: '/images/image/image9', title: 'نمایشگاه علی', name: 'امیری', city: 'سهرورد', avatar: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/car-brand-logo/desktop/lamborghini.jpg', }, ]; export default function index() { return (
